title: deiva guNam Onga
sahitya:
deiva guNam Ongat-tImaiyellAm nInga sheivAi bhavAni trishUlinI


anupallavi

  veyya rAkSasarai noyyavE puDaikkum vIrar pOTrum shakti un pErai shonnAl siddhi


caraNam    tIntaNalaip-pOlap-pUtta kuNDalini divya shaktiyuDan sEnA balamum
Atma dhIramum aruL purivAi amarEndiran pOl arasALa ulagai
